localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: FundedList is the best way to connect with hundreds of recently funded startup founders every week. The weekly reports contains verified emails, LinkedIn profiles, startup information, and funding data so you can send personalized outreach in seconds.
blogPost.body: FundedList is the best way to connect with hundreds of recently funded startup founders every week. The weekly reports contains verified emails, LinkedIn profiles, startup information, and funding data so you can send personalized outreach in seconds.
blogPost.title: FundedList - Weekly report of newly funded founders with verified emails
blogPost.author: Sean Graham

localize.description: FundedList是每周与数百名最近获得资金的创业者建立联系的最佳方式。周报中包含经过验证的电子邮件、LinkedIn简介、创业者信息和资金数据，因此你可以在几秒钟内发送个性化的宣传。
localize.tagline: 新资助的创始人的每周报告，并有核实的电子邮件。

localize.description: FundedList是每週與數百名最近獲得資金的創業者建立聯繫的最佳方式。週報中包含經過驗證的電子郵件、LinkedIn簡介、創業者信息和資金數據，因此你可以在幾秒鐘內發送個性化的宣傳。
localize.tagline: 新資助的創始人的每週報告，並有覈實的電子郵件。

previous.excerpt: A small tool for exporting competitor social media analytics into csv and xlsx. The tool is mostly free, but we have a premium version for $9/month Facebook pages and hashtag/location data is available soon.
previous.title: Export Competitor Social Media Data - Social media data into CSV and XLSX

localize.description: 一个小工具，用于将竞争对手的社交媒体分析数据导出为csv和xlsx。该工具主要是免费的，但我们有一个9美元/月的高级版本，Facebook页面和hashtag/位置数据很快就可以使用。
localize.tagline: 将社交媒体数据转化为CSV和XLSX格式。

localize.description: 一個小工具，用於將競爭對手的社交媒體分析數據導出爲csv和xlsx。該工具主要是免費的，但我們有一個9美元/月的高級版本，Facebook頁面和hashtag/位置數據很快就可以使用。
localize.tagline: 將社交媒體數據轉化爲CSV和XLSX格式。
